title: Learning Space Design and Interest-Based Self-Directed Knowledge Generation Program

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced domain expertise in science, proficiency in utilizing digital devices
context.additional_context: Learner-led project implementation in scientific domains by professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields

learning_goals: Learners apply neuroscience-based spatial design principles to design three or more engaging learning environments.
Learners independently conduct knowledge-generation projects on advanced science topics two or more times.
Learners document and present knowledge-development processes based on peer feedback using digital tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
